title: My Personal Experience: Encounter Evil's Fake Memory
body:
My Personal Experience: Encounter Evils’ fake memory



Early September 2015, I went to Pullman to engage in the Edward R. Murrow College of Communication at the Washington State University (WSU) in the production of a TV series to reveal the TRUTH. WSU’s College of Communication had a high rating in American journalism, and a few of the faculty had been researching cybernetic psychology, brain computer interaction, human rights, and political opinions related to what I wanted to reveal. Since my phone is controlled, I decided to go to Pullman and see who I could meet and talk to about the project. I already had some guidelines about the TV series in my proposal, including a budget of $20,000 seed money from my own pocket. From the first time I entered the Media Department building on Sept. 4 until I left Pullman in mid-November, the police were called five times. I did nothing wrong! The hidden criminal system followed my reporting efforts every second, mind controlling whomever I met, cancelling my appointments, preventing me from meeting those who might be able to expose them. School had just started when I brought my TRUTH proposal with me, as I was anxious to meet some faculty members that I could talk to. I had a list of preferred faculty members to see but was only able to see one, and she was not on my preferred list. I gave her a letter, and she told me I should talk to the Dean about my project.

I had my production proposal ready. I understand all faculty are busy, and I could not make an appointment by phone. So, I determined to introduce myself by hand-delivering some information as the only way to make brief contact, a normal way to share information. I tried to contact radio media production just to see who would be interested in exposing the truth, but I was not able to reach anyone directly in charge of the program. I then went to the public radio department trying to find out who I might talk to about exposing the truth. When I did not see anyone available to talk to, I sat down and quietly started reading their materials on the table for visitors. A man came in talking loudly to me. I suggested he should not talk so loudly as some program may be on the air. Just then two policemen came to me. When I asked what was going on, they told me they’d received many complaints that I was interrupting class. I told them that was not true. I also told them I had a case against the NSA, that the NSA and China spy had joined together to either mind control people or control the system to cause people to lie to the police and create fake reports about me purposely to get me out of the building. I kept telling the two officers, Sergeants Griffin and Melt, that I was being wrongly accused of the purpose of preventing me from being able to work on the project. I asked the police to investigate, and they said they would.

I returned to the Media Building to wait for the National Public Radio (NPR) staff. When I entered, I already knew that the opposition forces were there doing something. A man and a woman told me that all the rooms were closed and that no one was in the building. I ignored them and waited quietly in the NPR room. As I was imagining a talk show, two or three campus police officers arrived and told me that someone had called them about my entering and interrupting a class, and they asked me to leave. This was a big surprise as it was clearly not true. I started to ask who called because I had never been to any classroom but had been quietly sitting and waiting to talk to NPR. The police insisted I talk to them outside where they told me that the man and the woman had called and told them that I had disrupted their class. I kept telling the two police officers, Sergeants Griffin, and Melt, that I had never been in any of their classrooms, and that the call was a false accusation, purposed to prevent me from not being able to work on the TRUTH project. I insisted that they needed to investigate, and they promised they would but told me that I could not come to that building again. I immediately wrote about what happened as I knew my memory would be controlled, and I would not be able to remember the details.

I tried to contact many other faculty members on my list but was not able to reach anyone due to the phone control. On September 8 or 9, I was lucky to reach the program manager, Tom Huntley, at a campus three or four hours away. I took a taxi immediately to Richland to meet him and show him evidence materials and my unfinished proposal. Thomas said I should contact Marvin Marzelo and Chris Colony who were in project management. I told him about my problem in reaching anyone by phone and how I was now unable to enter the Murrow building. I asked him to make an appointment for me. The next day, he told me he had made an appointment for September 16 at 2 p.m. at 101 Gorzen Building. On September 16 at 12 noon, I called Tom to make sure there were no changes to the appointment. He told me he had not heard about anything changing. I asked if he had gotten a chance to speak to the Dean about the project, and he said he does not talk much with the Dean. He also told me that if I could convince these two people in heart and mind, the project would get going.

I went to the appointment at 2:00. The front desk told me to wait for the production manager. While I was waiting, the dean showed up, dressed in a neat suit. This was the first time I had seen him in person, though I had seen his photo on the internet. I greeted him with, “Hi, Dean.”

He looked at me like a wild animal. “You, leave! You have interrupted my building and classes.” I said I had not and that I had an appointment at 2 PM. I smiled, trying to calm him down, explaining, “Dean, that was not true.”

But his anger was intense; he was unreasonable and unable to hear.

"You get out of here. I do not want to talk to you. If you don't leave, I will call the police."

So, I left. I went outside to call a taxi. It was Dean’s online profile that had brought me from Seattle to Pullman. I had thought he might be someone who cared about the Truth. But his brain had been totally controlled, occupied by the negative images that the cybercriminals had inserted into his brain. He became illogical, lost his judgment, and was emotionally dominated by anger.

My heart was broken. Due to the Dean's action, the production manager did not show up and the carefully planned by third party appointment failed. As the taxi took me off campus, the taxi driver said that a police car was following us. We stopped and waited. They said someone had called them, but they saw that I was already leaving. I told them the entire story and asked them to investigate. I also gave them Tom Huntley’s phone number.

Ever since I was kicked out of the Murrow building with false accusations, the battle has shifted to the WSU library. I so much appreciate the opportunity to be able to use library facilities. For all these years, the battle has been to prevent me from using computer research facilities so I can make progress in reporting the TRUTH. Since I do nothing wrong, they must flag any fault they can find, or create one and flag it big. From the first day I use a library facility, the spy's cybernetic system starts to invade the facility like a virus, spreading and penetrating. Cybernetic mind control basically recruits students, faculty, and the community as master-slave followers against me. I have watched their recruitment through professional business directories. They act differently. One lady waits for me to go to the bathroom, then enters right away, makes noise to signal the spy to locate me by my Geographic API to attack me and send nanochips while I have my pants off using the bathroom. They come to the library and do nothing but walk around with their cellphones, appearing to check their messages, but their every search brings attack signals. Some are in the library every time I come, watching me every second, making noise whenever I change location from one room to another or walk out of the library to another location.

One time, I discovered one of their faultfinding efforts. The cybernetic attacks on my body include control over my urine system. By pushing a button, they can make me pee, which requires me to wear and change diapers, put them into a plastic bag, and throw them in the bathroom garbage. One day, I saw my used diaper on the floor close to the bathroom. One of the cybernetic stalkers had taken my wrapped dirty diaper out of the plastic bag from the garbage container and had thrown it on the floor outside the bathroom to make people see it and complain! I picked it up and threw it into the garbage again.

Ever since the Murrow incident, Satanic Evils had been planning to get me kicked out of the WSU library. One day while using the computer near the library entrance, I noticed that many students were lined up to use the computer right in front of me. The innocent students would never know that when they opened their email or downloaded their tickets and invitations, that mail would have malicious attacks directed at me.

Due to that kill event, I started searching for alternatives. The library’s ground level had a quiet room with almost no computers except two located at the entrance that I could use. I could also turn the lights off. The China spy, Yuan Sun, and his cybernetic crew would hate to see me getting fewer attacks and would use any excuse to pull me out of there, so I was careful not to give them any excuse. If anyone came to use the scanner, I would let them use the computer and scanner to make them comfortable. Meanwhile, I would work at a different table. Still, there was something I could not avoid.

In early October while I was writing my project, two police officers suddenly showed up and told me that I had to leave for 24 hours. The library had called them. When I asked why, they said they did not know, but maybe I had made the library too comfortable for myself because I had a lot of stuff there. I told them that to write a project documentary series, I would need many supportive documents and that I had to take bags of documents with me. After my 24 hours off from the library, I came back and talked with Sue, the library director, about what library rules I had violated, why and who had called the police. Sue told me that the Dean had said to call the police because of many complaints. To mind control a manager or director to feel there are many complaints against me is another of Evil’s tricks.

I told Sue about mind control and why I work on these projects; that even if I do nothing wrong, people still accuse me wrongly perhaps because they are being mind controlled. When Sue thought that the Dean told her to call the police, it could be she or the Dean were being mind-controlled to call the police, look for complaints, etc. One Chinese spy can mind control the entire cybernetic system by manipulating followers and the mass population! These actions and capabilities are written in the documents I have analyzed. This is the power of cybernetic mind control.

The cybernetic intrusion on the WSU libraries’ computers started a few months before I arrived there, possibly as an initial setup. I discovered from library logs that the earliest intrusion was May 12, 2015. Many library computers already use AMD Athlon II from Hewitt Packard (HP). Strangely, the computer was clearly labeled AMD Athlon, but when I clicked, I did not find the AMD Athlon program. However, computers NOT labeled AMD Athlon ran AMD Athlon programs. The early intrusion on May 12 did not look like it was from Yuan Sun, but the same system could have been from other sources. Then when I arrived at WSU, Yuan Sun took over.

I felt I should let the IT department know. First, I asked the assistant Beth if I could talk to the Dean regarding the system intrusion so he could find someone who would be able to read the documents. Beth smiled while I talked and agreed to take my document to the Dean. A few minutes later, she came back and told me that the library Dean would meet with me. To my surprise, the Dean did not know what I was looking for and immediately mumbled that if my “bizarre behavior” continued, I would have to leave the library. title: Jesus Talking About Holy Love And The Secrets Of United Hearts Chambers
body:
Jesus Talking about Holy Love and the secrets of United Heart Chambers

HOLY LOVE IS – THE TWO GREAT COMMANDMENTS OF LOVE, THE FULFILLMENT OF THE GOSPEL MESSAGE, AND THE EMBODIMENT OF THE TEN COMMANDMENTS

When the Pharisees heard that Jesus had silenced the Sadducees, they assembled in a body; and one of them, a lawyer, in an attempt to trip Him up, asked Him, “Teacher, which commandment of the law is the greatest?” Jesus said to him, “You shall love the Lord your God with your whole heart, with your whole soul, and with all your mind. This is the greatest and first commandment. The second is like it: You shall love your neighbor as yourself. On these two commandments the whole law is based, and the prophets as well.”



– Matthew 22:34-40

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. I have come to speak to you about the virtue of love. Holy Love is, as you know, the two great commandments: love God above all else and your neighbor as yourself. It is the embrace of all Ten Commandments. Holy Love is the Immaculate Heart of My Mother. It is the Divine Will of God.”

“Holy Love can be likened to the sun, which spills its rays over the earth enlightening the shadows of darkness. It is like the keys to the kingdom I entrusted to My apostle Peter. It is the door to My Sacred Heart and union with Divine Love.”

“Holy Love is the harmony between man, nature, and the Creator. It is the interpretation of the law and the means of all sanctification.”

“The will of man must choose Holy Love. It is not open to debate, and stands undaunted in the face of discernment. Holy Love cannot be judged, for it is the judge.” “Holy Love is offered in every present moment and follows the soul into eternity.”

“You will make this known.”

June 28, 1999

SELF-LOVE vs. HOLY LOVE

SELF-LOVE HOLY LOVE
“Is motivated towards self advantage in thought, word and deed.” “Is motivated in every thought, word, and action by love of God and neighbor as self.”
“Sees only others’ faults, not his own. Considers himself on the right path––perhaps even humble and virtuous.” “ Sees himself full of imperfections. Is always seeking to be perfected through love. Considers everyone more humble and holy than himself.”
“Holds a checklist in his heart of every wrong perpetrated." “Imitates Divine Mercy as best he can. Is compassionate and forgiving.
“Is quick to anger and stands vigil over his own rights making certain they are not transgressed.” “Is patient. Takes notes of others’ needs and concerns.”
“Hangs on to his own opinions refusing to surrender to another viewpoint.” “Offers his own opinions but listens to others and lends them equal merit with his own.”
“Takes pride in his own achievements. May even take pride in his spiritual progress.” “Realizes all things proceed from God; that without God he is capable of no good thing. All good comes from God’s grace.
“Sees himself and the world as the be-all/end-all. His only pleasure is thus achieved though the world.” “Takes joy in storing up heavenly treasure; in growing closer to God and deeper in holiness. Knows the difference between earthly pleasures and spiritual joy.”
“Uses the goods of the world to satisfy self.” “Uses the goods of the world to satisfy quest for holiness.”
“Objects to every cross. Sees trials as a curse. Resents others’ good fortune.” “Surrenders to the cross through love as Jesus did. Sees crosses as a grace to be used to convert others.”
“Prays only for himself and his own needs.” “Prays for all in need.”
“Cannot accept God’s Will. Becomes bitter over trials.” “Accepts God’s Will with a loving heart even when difficult.”


(Given to Maureen Sweeney-Kyle by Blessed Mother on August 18, 1997)

"Tonight, I have come to ask that all of My brothers and sisters unite in prayer towards their own personal holiness. Do not let Satan discourage you in this… He would have you think you have prayed enough, you have sacrificed enough. It is never too much. I am with you in your efforts towards holiness."

Jesus
February 29, 2008

cat: God, The Father Explains His Commandments
title: Introduce God Chosen Messenger, Maureen
body:
Introduce God chosen Messenger, Maureen Kyle

ABOUT THE APPARITIONS

Since 1985, Jesus and Blessed Mother have been appearing to Maureen Sweeney-Kyle on an almost daily basis and have given her a series of missions to accomplish. 1986–1990

OUR LADY, PROTECTRESS OF THE FAITH
NOTE: On August 28, 1988, Our Lady came as “Guardian of the Faith” to Visionary, Patricia Talbot, of Cuenca, Ecuador, in South America. In 1991, the Bishops of Ibarra and Guayaquil in Ecuador approved the movement which contains the name “Guardian of the Faith” and thus implicitly the title. 1990–1993

PROJECT MERCY

(Nationwide Anti-Abortion Rosary Crusades) 1993–Present

The combined Revelations of MARY, REFUGE OF HOLY LOVE and the CHAMBERS OF THE UNITED HEARTS. In 1993, Our Lady asked that this Mission be known as HOLY LOVE MINISTRIES. About the Apparitions 11 Visionary: Maureen Sweeney-Kyle is a very shy, timid and frail housewife and grandmother. She grew up and still resides in the Cleveland, Ohio area with her husband. In 1993, Our Lady began Holy Love Ministries and then requested that the Ministry procure property for a shrine in Lorain County, Ohio. This was accomplished in 1995. This 115-acre shrine is now known as Maranatha Spring and Shrine, the home of Holy Love Ministries, an Ecumenical Lay Apostolate to make known to the world the Chambers of the United Hearts.



Spiritual Director

Over the past twenty years, Maureen has had four spiritual directors who have been experts in Marian Theology. On the joyful occasion of the visit by the visionary, Maureen Sweeney-Kyle, with Pope John Paul II in August of 1999. Her husband, Don (lower right), Archbishop Gabriel Ganaka (top left), and Rev. Frank Kenney, her Spiritual Director (1994-2004) (top center), accompanied her on the visit.



Statement of the Ecumenical Lay Apostolate

Because the Messages are meant for all peoples and all nations, Holy Love Ministries is an ecumenical lay apostolate promoting Christian unity, as Jesus prayed in John 17:20-21. The Catechism of the Catholic Church, Section 821, describes ecumenism as “Prayer in common, because change of heart and holiness of life, along with public and private prayer for the unity of Christendom, should be regarded as the soul of the whole ecumenical movement, and merits the name ‘spiritual ecumenism'.”

Our Lord and Our Lady, and many saints, appear on the property. The Messages given lead the soul into personal holiness, especially through devotion to the Eucharist, Blessed Mother and the faithfulness to the Vicar of Christ and the Magisterium.

To exclude the rosary and other Catholic symbols from the Ministry would be to say Catholics must not be part of the ecumenical movement. This would be contrary to the local Bishop's and the Holy Father's ecumenical efforts.

Guided by Canon 215 (see below), we do not have any affiliation with a particular Diocese. All people are welcome to come and pray with us for unity in the Body of Christ (Eph 4:4-6).

As Canon 216 states that we have the right to promote our Ministry, this obviously includes voluntary fund raising. At the same time, we always encourage people to support their local parishes.

Canonical Support for this Mission

Canon 215 – The Christian faithful are at liberty freely to found and direct associations for purposes of charity or piety or for the promotion of the Christian vocation in the world and to hold meetings for the common pursuit of these purposes.

Canon 216 gives us the right to promote or sustain apostolic action “…all the Christian faithful have the right to promote or sustain apostolic action even by their own undertakings, according to their own state and condition.”

Further, the United Hearts of Jesus and Mary are both immersed in the Flame of the Eternal Now--My Paternal Heart."

"The Immaculate Heart is the Gateway to the New Jerusalem--the portal to the Divine Will--through which the Holy Trinity pours all grace into the world. United to the Sacred Heart of Her Son, Mary suffered in Her Own Heart, every wound and insult of the Passion with greater intensity than any human. She is closer to the Holy Trinity than any mortal ever was or will be. Therefore, she is a most powerful Advocate."

"Present the doctrine of this new Image to the world."

Please admirably observe this image: The most inner heart is Mary's with roses, and her heart is surrounded by Jesus' heart. The white space in between Jesus' heart and Mary’s is the Holy Spirit, and the flame is God, the eternal Father's heart. God is love; God is Mercy. Mary’s heart is perfect Holy Love. As a human being Mary’s original sin was redeemed through conceiving God’s child, raising Jesus as Her son, and suffering together with Jesus. That is what God means by Co-Redemptrix. Human beings all have original sins, yet some have more than others. When God chose Mary to conceive His child, God choose a heart that He trusted. Mary already had a pure heart that God trusted to raise, protect, and educate Jesus in the way God wanted.

While Mary’s heart is the perfect example of pure Holy Love for mankind, Jesus' heart is perfect Divine Love. Jesus died to save humans from their sins. On March 25, 2005, Good Friday, Jesus said,

“On this day so many hundreds of years long past, salvation mounted the cross. Yes, Love and Mercy were made one—suffered and died for all and for each one. My pain was made more intense when looking upon My sorrowing mother. Still today—for there is no time or space in heaven—you can console My mother as she stands at the foot of the cross.”

“My consolation as I hung dying was the knowledge of the Divine Mercy devotion in these latter days, and the spread of the Confraternity of the United Hearts. The Confraternity Opens the founts of Divine Love that is My Heart for all to share. It is through the knowledge of the chambers of the United Hearts souls that they will be assisted in their rise to perfection and will be able to find and to imitate Divine Love.”

“I held nothing back on Calvary. I surrendered all for the sake of sinners. Each of you must decide to surrender everything to Me to be free to choose Holy and Divine Love.”

“No pain I suffered on the Cross was too great, for I beheld the face of humanity before Me. I suffer still when I see any sinner turn away from me. I implore you to imitate Divine Love and Divine Mercy to one another. I will reach down from the Cross and help you.”

During my stay in Ohio, I was very amazed that people from all over the world would come to get blessings from this site, but the local people remained so ignorant and aloof. I was eager to introduce this God-true ministry to local pastors and priests. When I had a chance to meet two priests in my building, I asked if they knew about Holy Love Ministries in North Ridgeville. Both answered, “Yes, but we are not allowed to go there.” That proved that the Catholic Diocese in Cleveland tightly controlled their own from visiting Holy Love Ministries.

I also talked to three pastors regarding the Holy Love Ministries in North Ridgeville. One local Lutheran pastor came to our building to hold Bible studies every Wednesday. I joined that group. One day after Bible study when all the others had left, I engaged the pastor about the United Hearts image and told him that I served God at Holy Love Ministries. I started to explain what the image meant. When I started to talk about Mary, the pastor stared at me and said, “Mary is just like you and me, she is a human being. I do not worship her.” He suddenly became rude, did not allow me to explain any further, turned around, and left.

The 2nd pastor I talked to often came to my retirement home building in Strongsville to preach. He mainly preached about going to heaven, and he was so confident that he would be in heaven. One Thursday, after he finished preaching, he was invited by other residents for dinner. I joined that table. I started to introduce Holy Love Ministries and the God apparitions. Before I could finish, this preacher stopped me and said, “I believe only the Bible. Revelation says it is the end time. Human beings have sinned too much. They need to be destroyed and re-created.” He never heard what Holy Love Ministries was about.

The third pastor was the only one I was able to engage in a little discussion. He did not bring up the end times, but he could not accept the image of United Hearts. His excuse was that he couldn't worship Mary, a human being, as she had to overcome sin herself. I told him that Mary is the highest human being God put in heaven. This is what God says about the most Holy Trinity, United hearts, and Immaculate Mary. Still, the very nice pastor also would not listen further.



The Light of the Cross in cloud

Satan started against God by twisting God's words over 60 years ago using fake prophecy. The three pastors' responses to me regarding God's 21st Century Messages are all Satan-controlled behaviors. As I have read many of their original control documents, the Evil Enemy uses their media screen not only to control their targets' thinking, but also to inject angry emotions. The Enemy put words on its media screen that came out as the pastors were responding without the pastors first processing them thoughtfully. When I moved from Washington State to Ohio, the Evil Enemies moved their main control center to Holy Love Ministries and to my retirement home where I stayed. My body became the manifestation for their control.

Satan has been misleading humanity for over 60 years, dividing humans by groups and misleading each by using its specific beliefs so strongly amplified as to stoke the divisiveness. Any pastors whose favorite preaching is about the end times are Satan-controlled and their congregational prayers go to Satan strengthening his Evil Force.

Satan uses God's words against God, twisting His words and misleading human society group by group. Satan's dark control began by misleading pastors, priests, and many other religious leaders to spread wrong information for the control of almost the whole population.



Light of Heart in the sky

The Enemy knows God’s Holy Love Ministries, watches and reads the heavenly messages every day to lie about and cover up the Holy Love Ministries apparitions. For over 30 years, Jesus, Holy Mother, and God the Father have been coming to Holy Love Ministries from Heaven, their apparitions happening in the open field of North Ridgeville many times.

God's Holy Love Ministries is a ministry directly under God, our Heavenly Father. Holy Love Ministries has God's chosen messenger, Maureen Sweeny Kyle, who first delivered God’s messages monthly, then weekly, and in recent years, every day all year around. Satan, of course, is afraid of God's messages and events because Heavenly messages reveal all of Satan’s lies. If local priests were allowed to go to Holy Love Ministries, they would know the Truth.



Due to the Cleveland Diocese spreading rumors around, local news never reports any of the God apparition events. l talked with my retirement home activity director about taking community trips to Holy Love Ministries. Carol, the director, said she would go there for a visit, but a few days later she told me that she went to another Cleveland holy site and that it was the same. The Evil Enemy has confused people by building a similar site nearby and claiming it is Holy Love Ministries. When the Evil Enemy realized that God's Holy Love Ministries could not be controlled or destroyed, it started to make a fake one to confuse. However, I know clearly that Jesus, Holy Mother, and our Heavenly Father only appear at Holy Love Ministries located in North Ridgeville, Ohio and nowhere else. Still today the Evil Enemy spreads rumors on the internet about God's chosen messenger, Maureen Kyle. Local news does not report anything positive regarding God's Holy Love Ministries and the many apparitions of Jesus, Holy Mother, and God, our Heavenly Father. Satan's evil lying strategy has always been to first prevent truth from coming out. If prevention is not possible, then create a fake to confuse society.

Our Heavenly Father knows Satan’s challenge. On January 21, 2007, our Heavenly Father said: "The graces I pour through the Heart of the Immaculate Mary into the hearts of humanity lie unprecedented during these times. Also unprecedented are the ways in which Satan challenges My best efforts."

On June 15, 2018, our Eternal Father spoke about His decision to talk to the public through Holy Love: “My Creation is eternal. I choose these times to render the grace of My communication with humanity. I did not do so with Sodom and Gomorrah. I did not speak to all people in Noah's time. I do so here for the sake of the Remnant Faithful, which I desire to increase and strengthen...”

I arrived in Ohio in early June of 2018 and connected to our Heavenly Father. In recent years God talked in many messages about the “Remnant Faithful.” I know I am His Remnant Faithful. I consider God’s Truth fighters to be His Remnant Faithful as well. God is Mercy; God is love; God is wisdom. God specially created me and embedded me on the earth to save mankind. After I arrived in Ohio and read many messages, I knew God established Holy Love Ministries to equip me with Holy Love and offer me this cross so that I can accept these responsibilities.



Mary- in- Ray

Ever since I accepted God's cross, I have been confident that God’s Perfect Will, shall be done. I also got clear directions on how I should expose the Truth to wake up citizens. I want to use this opportunity to reach our community leaders, different religious leaders, such as priests, pastors, rabbi, and religious organizations to start to digest and to understand the messages of the Truth; No matter how many religious we have in society, we have the same God, even different religion have different names. I would like you know that God newly created image, the united Hearts is equally for every religion. Because we are all God children; There is no need to convert anyone to other different religion. Instead, you stay in your one religion and still can invite God newly created images pray and God will hear your prayer; You can equally pursue Holy love in your hearts as Holy love is the only judgment when we draw our last breath.



God, the Father Shrine

I am looking for fund that would help to get God 21st century messages all published so you will be able to read what God says in the 21st century; You will have a clear direction how to lead your congregation; you will be able to pass to your congregation of God newly created images and start pray before God newly created images to charge the hearts and the Satan controlled cosmos;

If anyone individual or organization want to be part of this God 21st century message book publishing, please fill up the attached slip to donate money for 3 to 4 books to be edited and published. Thank you so much for your support the Mission of Save our souls and lives.



Jesu and Holy Mother, statues in the apparition field



Sunset at angles of lake



Holy Spirit at Lake of tears



Jesus rose from Dead! Jesus Is Alive! Jesus is alive in Heaven! Jesus and holy mother established the holy Love Ministries on earth for over 35 years! For over 30 years God, both the Son and The Father and Holy Mother have been Appreciation to earth at Ohio Holy Love Ministries that located in the north Ridgeville, Ohio, which is the New Holy Land in America.

Why Holy Love Should be in our Hearts and in Society

Jesus explained Holy Love in many messages. On June 28, 1999, Jesus said:

“I am your Jesus, born incarnate. I have come to speak to you about the virtue of love. Holy Love is expressed, as you know, in the two greatest commandments: 'Love God above all else' and 'Love your neighbor as yourself.' It is the summation of all Ten Commandments. Holy Love is the Immaculate Heart of My Mother. It is the Divine Will of God.”

“Holy Love can be likened to the sun, which spills its rays over the Earth enlightening the shadows of darkness. It is like the keys to the kingdom I entrusted to My Apostle Peter. It is the door to My Sacred Heart and union with Divine Love.”

“Holy Love is the harmony between man, nature, and the Creator. It is the interpretation of the law and the means of all sanctification.”

“The will of man must choose Holy Love. It is not open to debate and stands undaunted in the face of discernment. Holy Love cannot be judged, for it is the judge.”

“Holy Love is offered in every present moment and follows the soul into eternity.”

When God gave me this every-moment cross for man’s salvation, He charged me to discover the Truth, to expose the Truth, and to wake up society to save our souls and our lives. God, our Heavenly Father, created us and wants us to live in His commandments and live in peace. God, our heavenly Father, also offered the choice of living with Him in eternity if our hearts are filled with Holy Love. On the other hand, Satan's goal is to corrupt mankind with hateful behavior to make him ineligible for life in heaven with God. Jesus will judge each one of us and send us to hell or heaven or purgatory.

Dear Brothers and Sisters: We love Jesus because He first loved us and died on the Cross to save us from our sins. But sadly, today many young people do not go to church and may never know who Jesus is or who God is. When I visit the Jesus Cross section at Holy Love Ministries, my heart is so heavy, and I feel we must all repent to Jesus. Today Jesus still suffers due to mankind's extremely sinful behaviors. Here is what Jesus said on April 18, 2003, Good Friday:

“Today, I come to describe to the world My Wounds.”

“The Wounds of My Hands were suffered for those who embrace evil and oppose righteousness. With ME there is no half-measure. You are either for Me or against Me.”

“The Wounds of My Feet were suffered for those who once walked in righteousness but have strayed from the path.”

“The Wound of My Heart was suffered for priests—the lukewarm priests—those who have compromised or forsaken their vocation—those who offer the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with sullied hands.”

“All of these I suffered for the Salvation of souls, and I suffer them still today.”

The Bible is not outdated. Jesus suffered for all of us 2000 years ago. He is still suffering when He sees mankind blindly following Satan or becoming Satan’s tools. I want to explain by a few examples why Holy Love must be in our hearts and in society, how someone can become Satan’s tool by joining the Targeting Force due to lack of Holy Love. And I want to remind all citizens that mankind is one society. If one or many choose to be Satan’s tools, that will affect the spiritual health of the whole society to varying degrees. By these examples I will try to show how the lack of Holy Love has caused our society to gradually fall into Satan’s hands. The result of becoming Satan’s tool is to harm all of humanity including oneself.

Example 1: Mr. Smar owns an online retail business, and he was hooked up by someone online years ago. He was told, “If you can fill up all our online forms, drive through guided directions when needed, we will give you more online customers without you doing any advertising. Also, you can recruit people as a social group locally and anyone you recruit under you, when they make money, you also share a certain percentage of the profit.” That sounded good, so Mr. Smar joined in. He filled up much paperwork online even though he did not know what they were all about. Some only required 'yes' or 'no,' some just needed to type in and repeat many times. Nothing seemed too hard, but it did require putting in some time. What made Mr. Smar smile was that his customer base was really growing without having to spend a dime. But what he did not quite like was that from time to time, he needed to move his truck out to the streets to do targeting, using his truck's head lights or taillights toward one specific car that he could see from the software in his truck. The specific car being targeted showed as a lighted dot moving in traffic on his device. He needed to meet that car head on or cut in front of that car to use his red taillights to assault the person sitting inside that car. That could take hours of time on the streets, but the system gave him credit for crypto money.

Comments: Mr. Smar was hooked up by the Satanic UFO Invading Enemies, the Invading Enemies’ Man-kill-Man-Force, whose goal is to destroy mankind. The customers that they brought to him without advertising and made him smile were brought using their online controlling power to redirect website customers to his site. In 2013, a friend of mine told me that her well-balanced business website did not have sales for almost a year. I looked and discovered that at the back of her website, it was clear that her online customers were being redirected to different websites with specific directions. What was really happening was that the Invading Enemies hijacked other people’s costumers from their websites and directed them to Mr. Smar's, increasing his obligation to them for more nefarious work. They filled up many online papers which were, in fact, Invading Enemies' attack documents. The Enemies never expose what is really behind their questionnaires, but from an operation document, regardless of whether you choose yes or no, all can be of benefit to their online attack packages. The required repeat typing is to build up the Enemies’ strong system of attackers known as trolls.

Thus, Mr. Smar is already officially a part of the Invading Enemies' Targeting Force. If he were in New York, he would go out any time I would go out by my taxi and use his truck's high energy equipment to target me by lining up on the street in anticipation of where I would go, either in Brooklyn or Manhattan. The Targeting Force would increase energies up and down the streets by having fire trucks flash their lights, emergency vehicles operate their sirens, and high-level LED lights, red lights, and traffic lights activated to emanate nuclear radiation. The Invading Enemies had already configured my body as a computer as well as the taxi I rode in so we could both be managed easily. One of the taxis that I used from time to time was configured to attack my left foot. As part of the Targeting Force, Mr. Smar in New York would have contributed his targeting efforts to hurt me and incapacitate me so I would not be able to get my book published. The consequence of that would be that the public would never be informed, nobody would wake up to the dangers, and mankind would be killed amidst huge suffering and destruction in their planned nuclear ending.

Example 2: Mr. Char is a Microsoft employee. He gets paid well with Microsoft salary and benefits. He writes comments on Microsoft products. He was recruited by the evil Invading Enemies to work for them. In 2015 on the Invading Enemies’ website Mr. Char was listed as earning the highest score among their Targeting Force. This could be one of the reasons that Microsoft never knew that their website had been controlled by the Invading Enemies for over 8 years. Sadly, Microsoft has betrayers, those who are in positions at Microsoft but who work for the Invading Enemies. Mr. Char gets paid double -- by both Microsoft and the Invading Enemies who control Microsoft with the goal of killing us all. Many people who become part of the Targeting Force are evil to begin with and find their positions in companies or in government where they can earn two salaries instead of just one. Being without a moral compass or an active conscience, they succumb easily to bribes and other 'benefits' to do things that harm other people and ultimately themselves, although they may not realize the latter at first. Remember, the Invading Enemies have planned for over 60 years to destroy our society, including you and your family.

If Satan/UFO were to ever clearly state that their goal is to totally wipe out humanity, to kill you and your family, would you ever do anything for them? No, unless you had totally seared your conscience and lost your moral compass. That is why it is up to each of us to maintain our individual immune system, not only for our physical health but more importantly for our spiritual health. For each of us our spiritual acuity depends on how much Holy Love we have in our hearts. Hearts filled with Holy Love would know when it is time to turn down a seemingly good deal because it violates God's living principles.

Example 3: Mr. Pipe has his own business fixing broken pipes. Nowadays many small businesses become part of the Targeting Force when they agree to contract with the Invading Enemies to do whatever they are asked to do -- for a fee, of course. In 2017, while I was in Washington State, I went to city hall as part of an investigation and asked for all the records of infrastructure changes including permits issued for projects done in downtown Olympia in 2016. I noticed that one of the permits was for changing out some underground pipes that had been reported as broken. So, I looked up the address where the permit had been issued intending to visit the ones who had done the work. But when I arrived at the address on record, I was met by a restaurant owner whose business was baking and providing food service. When I asked him about the gas pipeline, he stared at me with big eyes, seemingly perplexed by the question. Finally, he said, “We do not have any gas pipelines; we never use gas to cook.” I asked how long he had been in business; he told me about 9 years. Obviously, this Mr. Pipe was lying. He must have gotten calls from the Invading Enemies that they needed to install a new pipe. So, he lied and got permission to install a gas pipe, but he installed a new pipeline per the Evil Enemies’ instructions. I subsequently went to his place 3 times but was not able to find him. I called him but he didn't answer. I believe he knew he had done something very wrong. If I were to meet him, it would be hard for him to deny or to lie. So, the evil Invading Enemies who were monitoring me 24/7 just prevented me from being able to meet him.

Comments: The Sata/UFO Invading Enemies have been able to bring humanity to the crashing point because they are able to so easily manipulate human resources to work for them. The Enemies already know how to get any permits or permissions they might need through human personnel or online to make their activities appear legitimate. Then, when they don't follow the terms of the permit, they never get caught. In this manner they have changed our infrastructure into their system for destruction. What Mr. Pipe did is one of the many examples of how infrastructure changes are made. The Invading Enemies have taken full advantage of human greed; using money to allure and bribe always works for them. According to enemies’ extinction of mankind agendas of their planned 5 major Earthquakes to kill all humanity, I am sure that extra pipe Mr. Pipe put in was part of evils distribution line for nuclear for their planned huge earthquakes; Mr. Pipes is uncaringly and perhaps unwittingly helping the Enemies build the destruction infrastructure to kill all of us including himself and his family.

I could go on and on with examples of how humans are being used by Satan/UFO for the destruction of mankind. The reason Satan can do so is because human beings do not have enough Holy Love in their hearts.

I also want to tell my fellow citizens that personal holiness is not just one’s own personal business. Your lack of Holy Love and availability to the Invading Enemies to be used as their tools affects all citizens. Our Creator and Heavenly Father created us to live in peace. But to realize that we must follow His commandments. If all nations and people were to immediately learn about what Holy Love is, how to imitate Divine Love and Divine Mercy by joining the United Hearts through the Immaculate Heart of Mary for purification, it would result in Satan-polluted hearts being purified and, in the ability, to identify Satan's lies. When our hearts are pure, the Targeting Force will have no one to fulfill their evil agendas, and many who serve Satan's Invading Enemies will turn around to tell the public the truth.

Below is what Jesus teaching us on how to start practicing Holy Love. The First step is to pray to join the United Hearts:

“Today, I have come to help you see that the most important step in personal holiness lies at the threshold of entry into the first Chamber—the immaculate Heart of Mary—Holy Love. It is upon this threshold that the world is engaged in the greatest spiritual warfare. It is at the entrance of my Mother’s Heart the soul decides to believe or disbelieve these messages.”

“Some souls lie permanently vanquished at the threshold, giving in to the pride of disbelief. Others see the spiritual benefit they are offered. They pick up the key to the chamber of Holy Love which is the tittle and ejaculatory prayer, “Mary, Protectress of the faith and Refuge of Holy Love, come to my aid.” Thus, they are admitted and led deeper into the Chambers of Our United Hearts. Pray for those who arrive at the threshold.”

For the sake of returning Jesus' love, for imitating divine love and mercy, for the sake of saving our own souls and lives, each of us needs to pray to join the United Hearts as Jesus teaches us. To make sure you can remember this important prayer, and seriously pursue holy love , you can also be a member of Children of the United Hearts , Lay Brotherhood of the United hearts or Sisterhood-of-Divine-Love-Membership-info-and-sign up Please read the PDF files with clear understanding of the requirement, then fill up the application to be a membership of the united hearts organization, Jesus may help you to pursue the Holy Love, that will goes into your heart deeper and deeper for greater purification.

This is Jesus Says: “The will of man must choose Holy Love. It is not open to debate and stands undaunted in the face of discernment. Holy Love cannot be judged, for it is the judge.” “Holy Love is offered in every present moment and follows the soul into eternity.”

“You will make this known.”

cat: The Holy Trinity of the United Hearts & immaculate Mary
title: More of Jesus Talking on Holy Love
body:
More of Jesus Talking on Holy Love



SELF-LOVE HOLY LOVE
“Is motivated towards self advantage in thought, word and deed.” “Is motivated in every thought, word, and action by love of God and neighbor as self.”
“Sees only others’ faults, not his own. Considers himself on the right path––perhaps even humble and virtuous.” “ Sees himself full of imperfections. Is always seeking to be perfected through love. Considers everyone more humble and holy than himself.”
“Holds a checklist in his heart of every wrong perpetrated." “Imitates Divine Mercy as best he can. Is compassionate and forgiving.
“Is quick to anger and stands vigil over his own rights making certain they are not transgressed.” “Is patient. Takes notes of others’ needs and concerns.”
“Hangs on to his own opinions refusing to surrender to another viewpoint.” “Offers his own opinions but listens to others and lends them equal merit with his own.”
“Takes pride in his own achievements. May even take pride in his spiritual progress.” “Realizes all things proceed from God; that without God he is capable of no good thing. All good comes from God’s grace.
“Sees himself and the world as the be-all/end-all. His only pleasure is thus achieved though the world.” “Takes joy in storing up heavenly treasure; in growing closer to God and deeper in holiness. Knows the difference between earthly pleasures and spiritual joy.”
“Uses the goods of the world to satisfy self.” “Uses the goods of the world to satisfy quest for holiness.”
“Objects to every cross. Sees trials as a curse. Resents others’ good fortune.” “Surrenders to the cross through love as Jesus did. Sees crosses as a grace to be used to convert others.”
“Prays only for himself and his own needs.” “Prays for all in need.”
“Cannot accept God’s Will. Becomes bitter over trials.” “Accepts God’s Will with a loving heart even when difficult.”


(Given to Maureen Sweeney-Kyle by Blessed Mother on August 18, 1997)

"Tonight, I have come to ask that all of My brothers and sisters unite in prayer towards their own personal holiness. Do not let Satan discourage you in this… He would have you think you have prayed enough, you have sacrificed enough. It is never too much. I am with you in your efforts towards holiness."

Jesus February 29, 2008

January 18, 2007

As I (Maureen) was praying in my prayer room, a large Flame appeared. Then I heard a voice that said:

“All praise be the Blessed Trinity. I am God the Father.”

“You see My Heart before you as a massive Flame. It is the Flame of My Eternal, Divine Will which burn before you. It is this Flame that is the embodiment of Perfect Love and My Divine Will. My Heart is a Flame which engulfs the United Hearts of Jesus and Mary—of Holy and Divine Love—melting Them into Divine Union with My Will, never to be separated.”

“So, you see, I present to you a new Image—the complex Love—the Union of Holy and Divine Love completely immersed in the Flame of My Fatherly Heart, which is the Divine Will. Remembering that My Will is made up of Divine Love and Divine Mercy, you must see My Heart as the Will of Mercy and Love. It is the perfection I invite all people and all nations to step into, beginning with the Heart of Mary. It is Eternally My Will in you.”

June 5, 2007

Monthly Message to All People and Every Nation

Jesus and Blessed Mother are here. Their Hearts are exposed. Blessed Mother says: “Praise be to Jesus.”

Jesus says: “I am your Jesus, born Incarnate.” Jesus: “I have come to help the world understand these times in which you live. The advent of the Image of the United Hearts of the Holy Trinity and Immaculate Mary marks an importance you do not readily realize. The introduction of this Image into the world opens the Book of Revelation as regards events in the world at large. Watch and listen as the pages turn, for I tell you, the Image presented to you is apocalyptic in its entirety.”

“During this age of advanced technologies, people of all nations are rubbing shoulders through communications and faster travel. It is an age when, as never before, the boundaries of countries and ideologies are challenged. I come to you hoping to spread love amongst all people and all nations. Others, influenced by Satan, promote hatred. This is the battle between good and evil that the Adversary has engaged you in. While it used to be confined to certain areas or specific people in the world, or hidden in hearts, now it has spread to every nation. Satan uses modern technology to fan the flames of his war of deceit.”

“I do not use symbols to speak to you now. I tell you in straight forward language these truths. The righteous who slip from the path of good will bring more to bear upon this generation than the ones who never knew Me. Those who call Me their Lord and Master through pretense, but are devoted to self alone, will be visited by justice. Those who say they love Me, but do not trust Me, have fallen victim to Satan’s lies and will have their trust continually tested. Love and trust go hand in hand.”

“What lies in the future calls you to remain close to Me, for I am The Way, The Truth, and The Life. Security by any other means is false.”

“I do not come to you seeking approvals. I come seeking souls. As children of the light, I invoke you, pray that your numbers increase. In this way, the Remnant Faithful will be strengthened. Each one of you is called to apostleship, to be a disciple of Holy and Divine Love.

The Woman clothed with the sun is waiting to call all people and all nations into the purification of the United Hearts. Do not resist Her.”

“I know all the petitions in hearts here today. Some will receive what they desire; others will receive God’s Will for them but will not be satisfied.”

“Today I ask you, my brothers, and sisters, to allow My Victory to come into your hearts. Allow Me to build up the Kingdom of the Divine Will within your hearts in this present moment. To do so is to live always in the truth that is Holy and Divine Love.”

“My brothers and sisters, we’re blessing you with the Blessing of Our United Hearts.”

cat: The Holy Trinity of the United Hearts & immaculate Mary
title: Jesus Review the secrets of United Heart Chambers
body:
Jesus Review the secrets of United Heart Chambers



FIRST CHAMBER – SALVATION

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. I have come to further dictate to you.

the secrets of Our United Hearts - secrets of Our United Hearts - Salvation, holiness, perfection, conformity, and unity.”

“In the world today most of the world’s population remains unconverted; that is, they do not pursue their own salvation. Conversion comes through the grace of My Mother’s Heart. Thus, the Immaculate Heart of Mary is the First Chamber of Our United Hearts. It is the antechamber to holiness, perfection, conformity, and unity.”

“The Heart of My Mother is Holy Love - the two great commandments - to love God above all else and his neighbor as himself. No one attains salvation who will not abide by these commandments. And so, with or without knowing this, the soul who seeks his own salvation must gain entrance to the First Chamber of Our United Hearts - Holy Love - My Mother’s Heart.”

“Once the soul gains admittance to My Mother’s Immaculate Heart, his most glaring faults are brought to light through the Flame of Holy Love - The Flame of Her Heart. If he perseveres in grace, these faults will be burned away, and the soul will be allowed to pass into the Second Chamber of Our Hearts which is personal holiness. Now he is entering Divine Love and My Divine Heart.”

Jesus 01/25/2001

SECOND CHAMBER – HOLINESS

“I have come to you - your Jesus, born Incarnate. I invite you to see that each Chamber of My Sacred Heart is approachable only through a greater submission of free will. Thus, as the soul approaches the Second Chamber of My Heart, he begins his martyrdom of love; that is, he dies to his own free will as a sacrifice of love.”

“In the Second Chamber of My Majestic Heart -The Flame of My Heart - the soul pursues holiness. The Flame of Divine Love reveals small flaws of character that separate the soul from Me. In this Chamber of My Heart the soul is more aware of the present moment. He understands the past must be committed to My Mercy - the future to My Provision. He opens himself up to the grace of the present moment.”

“The souls in the Second Chamber of My Heart are becoming more aware of the Eternal Father’s Will for them and most accepting of My Father’s Will. Then as they surrender more and more to the Divine Will in the present moment, they prepare themselves for entrance into the third Chamber of My Sacred Heart.”

Jesus 01/26/2001

THIRD CHAMBER – PERFECTION IN VIRTUE

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. As the soul decides to pursue holiness, he is made more aware of the depth or lack of depth of the virtues in his heart. Every virtue proceeds from love and humility. Therefore, the depth of love and humility in the heart dictates thedepth of every virtue.”

“Every virtue originates from the power of the Holy Spirit. A person may know how to behave lovingly and humbly, but it is all pretense unless these virtues are alive and thriving in the heart. No virtue originates in the intellect. Further, the one who desires to be knownas humble, holy, virtuous is practicing false virtue. The practice of virtue needs to be between the soul and his Creator.”

“As the soul attempts to polish the virtues in his heart and refine them in the eyes of God, he enters the Third Chamber of My Heart. In this Chamber the soul finds himself tested over and over in every virtue, for it is the test that strengthens or weakens virtue according to the soul’s response.”

“This is the Chamber that fine-tunes holiness by testing the virtues as gold in the Flame of Divine Love. As the gold is refined, the soul is prepared for the next Chamber of My Heart.”

Jesus 01/27/ 2001

FOURTH CHAMBER – CONFORMITY WITH THE DIVINE WILL

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. I have come to describe to you the Fourth Chamber of Our United Hearts. This is the Chamber of sanctification. The soul that seeks conformity with the Will of God enters this fourth Chamber after he has successfully surrendered his will to a virtuous life of Holy Love in the present moment.”

“In this, the Fourth Chamber of Our United Hearts, there are still two distinct wills - man’s will and the Divine Will. Man’s will can be likened to gelatin in a mold. An effort is being made in this Fourth Chamber to overcome every semblance of sin - even small sinful habits - to transform the human will into the likeness of the Divine Will. The soul can acceptall things as from the hand of God.”

Jesus 01/29/2001

FIFTH CHAMBER – UNION WITH THE DIVINE WILL

“Behold! I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. I have come to describe to you the Fifth and most intimate Chamber of My Divine Heart. In this Chamber the soul is consumed with the desire to love Me - to please Me. In this love the soul is taking a giant step beyond conformity to the Divine Will. In conforming to the Will of God there are still two wills - God’s Will and the human will. The soul is making the effort to accept all things as from the Hand of God.”

“But in this most elite and intimate Fifth Chamber of My Heart, the soul not only accepts, but loves God’s Will for him. It is in this love that has been perfected in the greatest degree possible that the soul comes to union with the Divine Will. Few reach this fifth Chamber of My Heart.”

“See then that it is love that invites you into the First Chamber - the immaculate Heart of My Mother. It is love that invites you into the Second Chamber seeking greater purification and holiness. It is love that desires perfection in the virtues - the Third Chamber. It is love that takes the soul into the Fourth Chamber conforming the human will to the Divine. It is love which brings the soul into union with God in the Fifth Chamber. It is the depth of the soul’s surrender to love that determines his eternity.”

Jesus 1/31/2001

Conclusion

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate. If love is the entrance to each Chamber of My Heart, please understand then, that it is only by a deeper surrender to love that the soul can be transported from one Chamber to another.”

“In the First Chamber the soul must decide to love God more than sin. That is his salvation - the Heart of My Mother. In the Second Chamber the soul loves God and neighbor even more and seeks holiness. In the Third Chamber through a purer love the soul seeks perfection in every virtue. In the Fourth Chamber the purified soul, now more perfected in virtue, desires to conform his will to the Will of God. And those precious souls who reach the Fifth Chamber of My Heart, live in union with God’s Will. God lives in them and they in Him.My Father establishes His Kingdom within the hearts of those who enter the Fifth Chamber of Our United Hearts.”

“Pray this prayer: “Dear United Hearts of Jesus and Mary, I desire to surrender to Holy and Divine Love in all things, in all ways and in every present moment. Send me the grace so that I may do this. Help me as I try to respond to this grace. Be my protection and provision.Take up Your Reign in my heart. Amen.”

Jesus 02/01/2001

THE SIXTH CHAMBER - THE HEART OF GOD THE FATHER

The revelation of a sixth Chamber – the Heart of God the Father – the Highest Heaven began in April of 2003.

April 1, 2003

“I am your Jesus, born Incarnate...”
“I have come to explain to you the Sixth Chamber. It is the Heart of the Eternal Father. It embraces all the other Chambers of Our United Hearts. In this Chamber is God’s promise—a new covenant of love. The soulsthat pass into this Sixth Chamber have reached the Highest Heaven. In this life it is reserved for those who have already reached sanctity. In eternal life the saints and martyrs of love who reached the Fifth Chambermove into the Highest Heaven.”

“Since My Father’s Heart embraces all the Chambers of Our United Hearts, realize He calls each soul to be immersed in this Highest Heaven. For to him who has faith, all things are possible.”

April 2, 2003

“Praise be to Jesus. I am Margaret (Mary Alacoque). I have come to explain the Sixth Chamber as easily as I can.”

“The Sixth Chamber is the embrace of the Heart of God which is the Divine Will. The soul feels the embrace of the Father’s Heart increase as his soul is drawn deeper into the Chambers of the United Hearts. This being so, please see that as the soul is drawn into the First Chamber, he feels the Father’s embrace begin. Each subsequent Chamber allows the soul to feel the Father’s embrace increase. The Eternal Father tries to draw each soul into the Highest Heaven.”

January 28, 2005

St. Thomas Aquinas comes and says: “Praise be to Jesus.”
“Let us explore the Sixth Chamber—the Heart of God. In this Chamber the Heart of God comes alive in the soul. The soul then becomes a living tabernacle of the Divine Will. Such a soul is always at peace, for he has overcome the temptation to pride resulting in impatience, greed, anger, and every sort of debauchery born of pride.”

“Such a soul exists in the Heart of God at every moment and with every breath. He lives to appeal to God alone and to please others as they are pleasing to God.”

“Strive for this—it is attainable!”

Holy Love is:• “The two great Commandments of Love—to love
God above all else and to love neighbor as self.”
• “The fulfillment and the embodiment of the TenCommandments.”
• “The measure by which all souls will be judged.”
• “The barometer of personal holiness.”
• “The Gateway to the New Jerusalem.”
• “The Immaculate Heart of Mary.”
• “The First Chamber of the United Hearts.”
• “The Purifying Flame of Love of Mary’s Heart thatall souls must pass through.”
• “The Refuge of Sinners and the Ark of these lastdays.”
• “The source of unity and peace amongst allpeople and all nations.”
• “Holy Love is God’s Divine Will.”

(Jesus – November 8, 2010)

cat: The Holy Trinity of the United Hearts & immaculate Mary
title: Brief introduction of Maureen Kyle, God chosen messenger.
body:
Brief introduction of Maureen Kyle, God chosen messenger.

ABOUT THE APPARITIONS *********************************************** Since 1985, Jesus and Blessed Mother have been appearing to Maureen Sweeney-Kyle on an almost daily basis and have given her a series of missions to accomplish.

1986–1990

OUR LADY, PROTECTRESS OF THE FAITH

NOTE: On August 28, 1988, Our Lady came as “Guardian of the Faith” to Visionary, Patricia Talbot, of Cuenca, Ecuador, in South America. In 1991, the Bishops of Ibarra and Guayaquil in Ecuador approved the movement which contains the name “Guardian of the Faith” and thus implicitly the title.

1990–1993

PROJECT MERCY

(Nationwide Anti-Abortion Rosary Crusades)

1993–Present

The combined Revelations of MARY, REFUGE OF HOLY LOVE and the CHAMBERS OF THE UNITED HEARTS. In 1993, Our Lady asked that this Mission be known as HOLY LOVE MINISTRIES. About the Apparitions 11 Visionary: Maureen Sweeney-Kyle is a very shy, timid, and frail housewife and grandmother. She grew up and still resides in the Cleveland, Ohio area with her husband. In 1993, Our Lady began Holy Love Ministries and then requested that the Ministry procure property for a shrine in Lorain County, Ohio. This was accomplished in 1995. This 115-acre shrine is now known as Maranatha Spring and Shrine, the home of Holy Love Ministries, an Ecumenical Lay Apostolate to make known to the world the Chambers of the United Hearts.

Spiritual Director:

Over the past twenty years, Maureen has had four spiritual directors who have been experts in Marian Theology. On the joyful occasion of the visit by the visionary, Maureen Sweeney-Kyle, with Pope John Paul II in August of 1999. Her husband, Don (lower right), Archbishop Gabriel Ganaka (top left), and Rev. Frank Kenney, her Spiritual Director (1994-2004) (top center), accompanied her on the visit.



Statement of the Ecumenical Lay Apostolate

Because the Messages are meant for all peoples and all nations, Holy Love Ministries is an ecumenical lay apostolate promoting Christian unity, as Jesus prayed in John 17:20-21. The Catechism of the Catholic Church, Section 821, describes ecumenism as “Prayer in common, because change of heart and holiness of life, along with public and private prayer for the unity of Christendom, should be regarded as the soul of the whole ecumenical movement, and merits the name ‘spiritual ecumenism'.”

Our Lord and Our Lady, and many saints, appear on the property. The Messages given lead the soul into personal holiness, especially through devotion to the Eucharist, Blessed Mother and the faithfulness to the Vicar of Christ and the Magisterium.

To exclude the rosary and other Catholic symbols from the Ministry would be to say Catholics must not be part of the ecumenical movement. This would be contrary to the local Bishop's and the Holy Father's ecumenical efforts.

Guided by Canon 215 (see below), we do not have any affiliation with a particular Diocese. All people are welcome to come and pray with us for unity in the Body of Christ (Eph 4:4-6).

As Canon 216 states that we have the right to promote our Ministry, this obviously includes voluntary fund raising. At the same time, we always encourage people to support their local parishes.

Canonical Support for this Mission

Canon 215 – The Christian faithful are at liberty freely to found and direct associations for purposes of charity or piety or for the promotion of the Christian vocation in the world and to hold meetings for the common pursuit of these purposes.

Canon 216 gives us the right to promote or sustain apostolic action “…all the Christian faithful have the right to promote or sustain apostolic action even by their own undertakings, according to their own state and condition.”
